vsParam:
Hey, [px]!
It's crowded near the bulletin board. What's going on?

Excuse me, let us see it! This is not working... There are
too many people. We can't even see the board...

Ah, [px]! You are interested, right? The Student Union
posted that it will bring in the Adventurer System!

Ah, the Student Union posted that it will bring in the
Adventurer System. We must seize such an opportunity!

Yeah. Since you told us about the Adventurer System,
it became a hot topic among some students. Don't you know that?

You guys can go to distant places freely without a license...
Why would you trouble yourselves to be adventurers?

Trouble? Haha... But I understand them.
Because it's pretty cool!

Yeah! The Student Union seems to think that this is a
wonderful system. So they decided to set up one!

Some students are said to have taken commissions as adventurers
in private. That made the Student Union believe the system works.

What... How can this thing happen?
Adventures go hand in hand with dangers...

Students can improve themselves by taking commissions
the Academy receives... An idea that kills two birds with one stone.

I feel we are being used by the Student Union...
But it does sound interesting. I'm in!

Uh!? Er...
Are you all joining it?

Uh? This whole thing started with people's admiration for you
and your adventures. Why are you so gloomy?

Hmm... But I'm not as
good as everyone thinks.

There are only 3 alchemists in Arland.
That's why I got a chance to be an adventurer...

What? Only 3!?
But I bet this number doesn't negate anything, right?

Apart from alchemy, I'm basically useless...
Some adventurer friends even called me clumsy...

So, if the students of alchemy in the Academy get
serious, they'll excel me pretty soon...

Ah... ha ha ha!
T-Totori, you fool!?

That's why I called you a fool! Who do you think should take credit
for establishing the Adventurer System in this world?

Exactly! The students can only go on adventures
because of the map you drew.

Yes. You possess the power others don't.
So, don't be stressed.

That's right! If you are still worried,
go with us and upgrade your adventurer's level here!

Guys... Thank you!
I'll do my best!

Alright! Since it's settled...
Let's seize the opportunity and take a commission!

Uh huh.
For an adventurer, this is a good first step, right?

By the way... What on earth does the bulletin board say? I don't think
the Adventurer System alone could cause such a sensation, right?

You've got a point.
Let me see... Uh? Um—!?

Wh-what's this!?
It's signed by the Student Union President...

Uh? The student who reaches the highest level in the shortest time...
will win a dating coupon to go out with... me!?

Hazel really knows how to arouse everyone's
enthusiasm... Everybody is working hard to date you.

It's not very nice to make other people a reward
without consent...
Uh—! [px], why are you also like that!?

A-anyway, promising such a date without asking me
puts me in a very awkward situation!

But what's done is done...
Now I must be the first one to reach the highest level!

Yeah, that's the spirit!
Do your best, Totori!
